channel.title: error in downloading program
channel.description:
Hello. I'm new to linux and trying to download a program called "session".
link : https://snapcraft.io/install/session-desktop/debian
I'm following this site.
"sudo snap install session-desktop"
After type in the command,
"error: snap "session-desktop" has "install-snap" change in progress" It is shown like this. What's the problem?

item.title: error in downloading program
item.dc:creator: Levx
item.description:
Hello. I’m new to linux and trying to download a program called “session”.

link : https://snapcraft.io/install/session-desktop/debian

After type in the command,

It is shown like this. What’s the problem?
